extendedIngredients.name: canned pineapple
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 can (8 ounces) crushed pineapple, well drained

extendedIngredients.name: cream cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 packages (8 ounces each) cream cheese, softened

recipes.title: Pineapple Pecan Cheese Ball
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth. Stir in the pineapple, green pepper, onions, seasonings and 1/2 cup pecans. Place on a sheet of plastic wrap; shape into a ball. Refrigerate overnight.                                                                                            Just before serving, roll cheese ball in remaining pecans. Serve with crackers.                                        Yield: 3-1/3 cups.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Pineapple Pecan Cheese Ball in  CountryApril/May 1991, p47                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (2 tablespoons) equals 98 calories, 9 g fat (2 g saturated fat), 9 mg cholesterol, 99 mg sodium, 3 g carbohydrate, 1 g fiber, 2 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth. Stir in the pineapple, green pepper, onions, seasonings and 1/2 cup pecans.
Place on a sheet of plastic wrap; shape into a ball. Refrigerate overnight.
Just before serving, roll cheese ball in remaining pecans.
